    <script type="text/javascript">
     $(document).ready(function() {
   var $mobileMenu = $("#mobileMenu");
   var $mobileExit = $(".mobile-exit");
   var $hero = $(".hero-wrapper");
   var $leftWelcome = $(".welcome-left");
   var $rightWelcome = $(".welcome-right");
   var $secondaryContent = $(".secondary-wrapper .content");
   var $secondaryWidgets = $(".secondary-wrapper .widgets");
   
   if ($secondaryWidgets.children("div").length > 0) {
     $secondaryContent.wrap("<div class='col-xs-12 col-sm-7 col-md-8'></div>");
     $secondaryWidgets.wrap("<div class='col-xs-12 col-sm-5 col-md-4'></div>");
   } else {
     $secondaryContent.wrap("<div class='col-xs-12'></div>");
     $secondaryWidgets.hide();
   }
   
   // initialize mobile menu
   $mobileMenu.mmenu({
     offCanvas: {
       position  : "right",
       zposition : "front",
       panelNodetype : "div"
     }
   });
   
   $mobileExit.on("click", function() {
     $mobileMenu.trigger("close.mm");
   });
   
   // initialize sliders
   $hero.slick({
     arrows: false,
     dots: true,
     cssEase: 'ease-in-out',
     autoplay: true,
     autoplaySpeed: 5000,
     mobileFirst: true
   });
   $leftWelcome.slick({
     arrows: false,
     dots: true,
     cssEase: 'ease-in-out',
     autoplay: true,
     autoplaySpeed: 10000
   });
   $rightWelcome.slick({
     arrows: false,
     dots: true,
     cssEase: 'ease-in-out',
     autoplay: true,
     autoplaySpeed: 12000
   });
   
   $(".fa-search").click(function(){
     $(".searchHeader").slideToggle();
     $("#p_lt_wpzSearch_SearchBox_txtWord").focus();
   });
   
   $('.searchHeader .fa-times').click(function(){
     $(".searchHeader").slideToggle();
   });
   
   
   // ========================================================
   // 
   // Initialize Bootstrap tooltip(s)
   // 
   // ========================================================
   
   $('[data-toggle="tooltip"]').tooltip({'placement': 'bottom'});
   
   $(".sitemapBtn").click(function(){
     $("#FooterSitemap").slideToggle();
     $('html, body').animate({
         scrollTop: $(document).height()
     }, 1500);
   });
   
 });
    </script>
